TopicTitle: When I buy Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content: If I buy kerbal space program from the website, do I only get a steam key, only a download from the website or do I get both?
If you buy it through the website you will get a download only; if you buy it through Steam you will get a steam version only
Regardless of which store you buy from the game files have no DRM, and can be copied to, and run from any directory.
